docs.text: 概述 升级主要分为mailbox server和cas server，其中mailbox server即DAG members，升级过程中参考了以下官方文档： Anti-Virus Software in the Operating System on Exchange Servers Exchange admin center in Exchange 2013 Managing database availability groups 本次升级了解到了以下几点实践经验： 建议exchange所有节点之间端口全开 建议打开ipv6（经观察节点之间的心跳联系会以ipv6地址进行） 升级Cu补丁时，建议 cd 到所在目录以 ./ patch_name 运行，而非直接双击运行 exchange 2013环境中，只有cas角色才能访问owa和ecp，即 https:// CasServerName /owa 和 https:// CasServerName /ecp 对于exchange server上安装的杀毒软件，需要对exchange安装目录和db所在的目录添加例外。按照官方文档，还需要对exchange进程添加例外，但是进程工作时需要访问的文件已经被添加，所以进程级别没有做了。 下面开始升级步骤。 mailbox server升级步骤 传输队列状态设置为drain Set-ServerComponentState ServerName -Component HubTransport -State Draining -Requester Maintenance 传输队列开始drain Restart-Service MSExchangeTransport 将server服务切换到dag内其他服务器 Redirect-Message-Server ServerName1 -Target ServerName2 暂停该节点 Suspend-ClusterNode -Name ServerName 把该台server上的active db迁移到其他server上 Set-MailboxServer ServerName -DatabaseCopyActivationDisabledAndMoveNow $True 避免在该台server上自动active db Set-MailboxServer ServerName -DatabaseCopyAutoActivationPolicy Blocked 把服务器置为维护模式 Set-ServerComponentState ServerName -Component ServerWideOffline -State Inactive -Requester Maintenance 安装Cu Setup.exe /m:upgrade /IAcceptExchangeServerLicenseTerms 附上验证server已处于维护模式命令： To verify the server has been placed into maintenance mode, run Get-ServerComponentState ServerName | ft Component,State -Autosize To verify the server is not hosting any active database copies, run Get-MailboxServer ServerName | ft DatabaseCopy* -Autosize To verify that the node is paused, run Get-ClusterNode ServerName | fl To verify that all transport queues have been drained, run Get-Queue mailbox server升级后恢复服务步骤 ServerWideOffline组件恢复 Set-ServerComponentState ServerName -Component ServerWideOffline -State Active -Requester Maintenance 集群内恢复 Resume-ClusterNode ServerName server上可以active db Set-MailboxServer ServerName -DatabaseCopyActivationDisabledAndMoveNow $False server上可以active db Set-MailboxServer ServerName -DatabaseCopyAutoActivationPolicy Unrestricted 传输服务开启 Set-ServerComponentState ServerName -Component HubTransport -State Active -Requester Maintenance 重启传输服务 Restart-Service MSExchangeTransport cas server升级以及服务恢复步骤 再此不赘述，区别在于运行Cu之前在windows nlb内block掉server ip（具体情况视架构而定）
